beasybot.description_long_p2: My responsibility in the project was comprehensive, covering much of the development pipeline. I acted from scope definition to deployment on AWS.

meeting.description_short: AI meeting recorder that transcribes, summarizes, and highlights key points in real-time.

who_am_i.p1: Hello! My name is Bernardo Kirsch, I am a software developer focused on backend and passionate about creating technological solutions that make a difference.

hobbies.p2: I also love music, which helps me stay focused. There's nothing better than coffee, code, and Bad Bunny on headphones.
